Text: These solar developments represent a $74.1 million capital investment into rural North Carolina communities. Nearly 400 jobs were created throughout project construction, including 70 local jobs.
Cause: These solar developments represent a $74.1 million capital investment into rural North Carolina communities.
Effect: Nearly 400 jobs were created throughout project construction, including 70 local jobs.
Sentence: <e1>These solar developments represent a $74.1 million capital investment into rural North Carolina communities.</e1> <e2>Nearly 400 jobs were created throughout project construction, including 70 local jobs.</e2>
